intro:
SHIN AHRAM TRIO IS A jazz Trio from the South Korea.
Consisting of pianist Ahram Shin ,Bassist Minki Cho and Drummer Junghwan Park.
 
SHIN AHRAM TRIO was formed by Pianist Ahram Shin, Drummer Junghwan Park who studied at New York University in America and Minki Cho graduate Conservatorium van Amsterdam JAZZ DOUBLE BASS in Netherlands
This Trio was formed in 2015

[Genres] 
- Classical Music, Swing Music, Bebop music, Avant-garde, Own music

 This trio aim for emotional melody ,energy , freedom improvisation Piano trio
name: 신아람 트리오
member: Piano 신아람 Drums 박정환 Bass 조민기
